mapper.select: select csu.*,cs.last_message as lastMessage,cs.last_receive_time as lastReceiveTime, case when substring(csu.contact_id,1,1)='G' then (select count(1) from user_contact uc where uc.contact_id = csu.contact_id) else 0 end as memberCount from chat_session_user csu inner join chat_session cs on csu.session_id = cs.session_id where csu.user_id = #{userId} order by cs.last_receive_time desc
